Some seasonable considerations for the good people of Connecticut Bulkeley, Gershom, 1636-1713.
62 p.
Lisenced by M. Clarkson, secretary, and printed at New-York [by William Bradford], [New York] : Anno Domini, 1694].
Caption title. William Bradford's name from Wing. Reproduction of the original in the Bamburgh Castle Library, University of Durham.
